General.Name: Farasis Energy Gan Zhou Co Ltd
General.Description: Farasis Energy (Gan Zhou) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells lithium-ion pouch batteries. It offers its products for electric cars, sports cars, electric motorcycles, electric bicycles and buses, electric trucks, air and rail transportation, marine, renewable energy, power grid energy, industrial energy storage, data center, communication station, residential energy storage, electric forklifts and excavators, electric hoisting machinery and mining vehicles, and electric agricultural and aerial work machinery. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Ganzhou, China.

2.Name: Dr. Keith D.  Kepler
2.Title: Deputy GM, Dean of the Research Institute & Director
